title: Paint Me a Monster
description: Rinnie Gardener's life looks like a perfect painting from the outsideâ€”a loving family and a beautiful house. But when the paint is stripped away, this dream dissolves to dust. Her parents divorce. Her father treats her like a stranger. Her mother, looming like a black cloud, treats her worse. Painful words become painful bruises. Rinnie's own body becomes a source of self-punishment.
author: Janie Baskin
